name: CitiesofIndia
0:
”Alexa open cities of India”
”Is it the city of Bangalore?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cities of india
des: Each time you start the game, Alexa will pick a city in India. You will have to guess it. Don't worry, all the cities Alexa picks have a population of at least a million - so quite likely you would have heard of it!
